translations: n.双元音；复合元音（diphthong 的复数）

phrs.translation: 双元音, 双重母音, 双母音
集中双元音, 中双元音
中双元音, 双元音, 合口双元音

sentences.sentence: My daughter reviews four diphthongs in Phonics 3-2 today.
sentences.translation: 我女儿今天复习了自然拼音3 - 2的四个字母组合发音。

sentences.sentence: This was a systematic shifting of half a dozen vowels and diphthongs in stressed syllables.
sentences.translation: 这是系统性的变化，重读音节的6个元音和双元音都发生了变化。

sentences.sentence: And main body consists of Aga vernacular short vowels, Aga vernacular long vowels, Aga vernacular diphthongs.
sentences.translation: 正文由阿嘎土语短元音分析、阿嘎土语长元音分析、阿嘎土语复合元音分析三部分组成。
